result.html: Bliain fhada ab ea éit was a long year.

result.html: Buile marfach ab ea éIt was a lethal blow.

result.eng: I turned on the radio, as usual, to listen to the morning's news programme.

result.eng: He was an Irishman who had been living in America for a long time.
